ad_text: Triton Logistics, Inc. Sponsored Seeking to hire a knowledgeable and dependable Dry-Van Trailer Mechanic! Position Responsibilities- •Inspecting, troubleshooting, and repairing Dry-Van bodies, systems, and components •Performing preventative maintenance measures •Maintaining hubs and axles and adjusting or replacing them when required Requirements- •Previous experience as a Dry-Van trailer mechanic • Tools •Ability to work independently and/or as a team member •Ability to perform physical requirements of the position with or without reasonable accommodations We Offer- •Paid time-off •Uniforms are provided and routinely cleaned •Professional development and growth within the company •W-2/1099 available *Hourly pay is based on experience and knowledge If interested in coming in for an interview, or have any questions - please apply or txt 630-234-0062 FULL-TIME · ROMEOVILLE, ILLINOIS Dry-Van Trailer Mechanic Apply now

Triton Logistics, Inc. Sponsored Triton Logistics Inc. - a well-established and successful transportation company is seeking a knowledgeable and dependable Maintenance Technician to join our fleet. Willing to train a right candidate. Position Responsibilities- • Conducting maintenance tasks and minor fixes around the shop • Operating Wheel Balancing and Tire Alignment machinery • Operating commercial floor-cleaning machine • Grounds keeping duties as assigned Requirements- • Previous experience as a maintenance technician or similar role • Ability to work independently and/or as a team member • Ability to perform physical requirements of the position with or without reasonable accommodations We Offer- • Paid time-off • Professional development and growth within the company • Uniforms are provided and routinely cleaned • W-2/1099 available Hourly pay based on experience and previous work history. If interested in coming in for an interview, or have any questions - please apply or txt 630-234-0062 FULL-TIME · ROMEOVILLE, ILLINOIS Maintenance Worker Apply now

Triton Logistics, Inc. Sponsored Hiring Regional OTR Driver ⭐️ Be Home Every Weekend 🏡 ✅ Make $2000/week ✅ Starting rate is $0.65 cpm BUT a minimum of $250 per day! Whichever is in drivers favor. For example, if you do 200 miles a day, you'll make $250 for that day. But if you do 500 miles a day, you'll get paid $0.65cpm and earn $325 for that day. ✅ Driver must communicate with the dispatcher and work for 5 days. ✅ Won’t be paid the bonus if a truck has breakdown or if a driver doesn’t leave out on time on Monday. 📍 Covering areas – Minneapolis, MN; Cincinnati, OH; Louisville, KY; Memphis, TN; Kansas City, MO; Indianapolis, IN. ✅ Drop & Hook – just a small amount. ✅ No paid vacation for regional drivers. ✅ No escrow for regional drivers. ✅ Based on your performance, we can turn a 1099 into a W-2 FB.ME Hiring Regional OTR Driver Learn more
